text: Aur inn logon ney qasmon mein bara zor laga ker Allah Taalaa ki qasam khaee kay agar inn kay pass koi nishani aajaye to woh zaroor hi uss per eman ley aayen gay aap keh dijiye kay nishaniyan sab Allah kay qabzay mein hain aur tum ko iss ki kiya khabar kay woh nishaniyan jiss waqt aajayen gi yeh log tab bhi eman na layen gay
